title: Sound Opinions Evergreen Episode 2015
teaser: This is an Evergreen episode of Sound Opinions that can air at any time during the year.
description:
ANNOUNCER COPY: Coming up on Sound Opinions…some of the best musical pairings of all time—Simon & Garfunkel, Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell and more!
FEATURE SEGMENTS 1 & 2:
   Hosts Jim DeRogatis and Greg Kot play their favorite duets in pop music history. Their picks include duo performances by Simon & Garfunkel, Iggy Pop and Kate Pierson and Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell.
FEATURE SEGMENT 3:
    Jim adds a track to the Desert Island Jukebox. He chooses "Uncle Albert/Admiral Halsey" by another great duo: Paul and Linda McCartney.
YOUR SOUND OPINIONS:
At the end of the show we hear comments from listeners.
contentencoded:
ANNOUNCER COPY: Coming up on Sound Opinions…some of the best musical pairings of all time—Simon & Garfunkel, Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell and more!

FEATURE SEGMENTS 1 & 2:

Hosts Jim DeRogatis and Greg Kot play their favorite duets in pop music history. Their picks include duo performances by Simon & Garfunkel, Iggy Pop and Kate Pierson and Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell.

FEATURE SEGMENT 3:

Jim adds a track to the Desert Island Jukebox. He chooses "Uncle Albert/Admiral Halsey" by another great duo: Paul and Linda McCartney.

YOUR SOUND OPINIONS:

At the end of the show we hear comments from listeners.
